channel.title: Really easy money
channel.description: Ok so i wanted to try the green dragon killing thing for money and they was about 14players. im combat 97 + 4 (101) so i was able to kill 12 outa the 14 players cuz i one 73 and other wasnt botting. i got 208 dragon bones 580k. I killed the players very quick with ice barrage. If u have high combat and no money do this its very very easy and it fixs the bot problem also if u wait 30mins they will all be their again

item.title: Really easy money
item.dc:creator: @rip4d rip4d
item.description:
@rip4d wrote:

I just use goliaths and royal Dhide. I can get everything I need from 0 coins easy and then earn 450-600k depending on my luck

Read full topic

item.title: Really easy money
item.dc:creator: @kingman002 kingman002
item.description:
@kingman002 wrote:

[quote="…::Coded::…, post:4, topic:450130"]Bot killing has been around since the trade limit was lifted, if you just found out about it now then your a bit slow.

For the best money kill them while they are walking to the bank, that way they have a full inventory of bones.[/quote]
I’ve known about bot killing, but I’ve never thought about doing it because I don’t really have the player killing stats. I have 85 attk, 86 str, 86 hp, 82 def, 60 prayer

Read full topic

Bot killing has been around since the trade limit was lifted, if you just found out about it now then your a bit slow.

For the best money kill them while they are walking to the bank, that way they have a full inventory of bones.
[/quote]

They dont walk anymore they tele now[/quote]
Oh lol, then just watch them and kill them after they killed a few dragons
